subclassFluff.name: Artillerist
entries: {@i Wield Destructive Power from Afar}

entries.name: Design Note: Artillerist Updates
entries: Here are the main updates in this subclass since its appearance in {@book Tasha's Cauldron of Everything|TCE}:

items.name: Tool Proficiency
entries: now allows the Artificer to craft magic {@item Wand|XPHB|Wands} faster.

items.name: Eldritch Cannon
entries: now allows each cannon to use the Flamethrower, Force Ballista, and Protector options.

items.name: Explosive Cannon
entries: now detonates as a {@variantrule Reaction|XPHB}, instead of an action, and its damage has been increased.

classFeature.name: Artillerist
entries: An Artillerist specializes in using magic to hurl energy, projectiles, and explosions on a battlefield.

classFeature.name: Artillerist Spells
entries: When you reach an Artificer level specified in the {@table Artillerist Spells|XUA2024Artificer} table, you thereafter always have the listed spells prepared.

classFeature.name: Eldritch Cannon
entries: Using {@item Woodcarver's Tools|XPHB} or {@item Smith's Tools|XPHB}, you can take a {@action Magic|XPHB} action to create a Small or Tiny {@object Eldritch Cannon|XUA2024Artificer} in an unoccupied space on a horizontal surface within 5 feet of yourself. The cannon's game statistics appear below. You determine its appearance, which includes your choice of legs or wheels. It disappears if it is reduced to 0 Hit Points or after 1 hour. You can dismiss it early as a {@action Magic|XPHB} action.

Once you create a cannon, you can't do so again until you finish a {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB} or expend a spell slot to create one. You can have only one cannon at a time and can't create one while your cannon is present.

classFeature.name: Tool Proficiency
entries: You gain proficiency with {@item Woodcarver's Tools|XPHB}. If you already have this proficiency, you gain proficiency with one other type of {@item Artisan's Tools|XPHB} of your choice.
In addition, when you craft a magic {@item Wand|XPHB}, the amount of time required to craft it is halved.

classFeature.name: Arcane Firearm
entries: When you finish a {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}, you can use {@item Woodcarver's Tools|XPHB} to carve special sigils into a {@item Rod|XPHB}, {@item Staff|XPHB}, or {@item Wand|XPHB} and thereby turn it into your arcane firearm. The sigils disappear from the object if you later carve them on a different item. The sigils otherwise last indefinitely.

You can use your arcane firearm as a {@variantrule Spellcasting Focus|XPHB} for your Artificer spells. When you cast an Artificer spell through the firearm, roll {@damage 1d8}, and you gain a bonus to one of the spell's damage rolls equal to the number rolled.

classFeature.name: Explosive Cannon
entries: Every {@object Eldritch Cannon|XUA2024Artificer} you create is now more destructive. You gain the following benefits:

items.name: Detonate
entries: When your cannon is reduced to 0 Hit Points, you can take a {@variantrule Reaction|XPHB} to command the cannon to detonate if you are within 60 feet of it. Doing so destroys the cannon and forces each creature within 20 feet of it to make a Dexterity saving throw against {@dcYourSpellSave}, taking {@damage 3d10} Force damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

items.name: Firepower
entries: The cannon's damage rolls increase by {@damage 1d8}.

classFeature.name: Fortified Position
entries: You're a master at forming well-defended emplacements using your {@object Eldritch Cannon|XUA2024Artificer}. You gain the following benefits:

items.name: Double Firepower
entries: You can now have two cannons at the same time. You can create two with the same {@action Magic|XPHB} action (but not with the same spell slot), and you can activate both of them with the same {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB}, ordering them to use the same activation option or different ones. You can't create a third cannon while you have two.

items.name: Shimmering Field Projection
entries: You and your allies have {@variantrule Cover|XPHB|Half Cover} while within 10 feet of your {@object Eldritch Cannon|XUA2024Artificer}.

entries: {@note Created by the {@subclassFeature Eldritch Cannon|Artificer|XUA2024Artificer|Artillerist|XUA2024Artificer|3} subclass feature.}

actionEntries.name: Activate Cannon (Requires You to be within 60 Feet of the Cannon)
entries: As a {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB}, you order the cannon to use the Flamethrower, Force Ballista, or Protector option below; you can direct the cannon to move up to 15 feet before or after that option:

items.name: Flamethrower
entries: The cannon exhales fire in a 15-foot {@variantrule Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone}. Each creature in that area makes a Dexterity saving throw against {@dcYourSpellSave}, taking {@damage 2d8} Fire damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. Flammable objects in the {@variantrule Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone} that aren't being worn or carried start burning.

items.name: Force Ballista
entries: Make a ranged spell attack originating from the cannon at one creature or object within 120 feet of it. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 2d8} Force damage, and if the target is a creature, it is pushed up to 5 feet away from the cannon.

items.name: Protector
entries: The cannon emits a burst of positive energy that grants itself and each creature of your choice within 10 feet of it a number of {@variantrule Temporary Hit Points|XPHB} equal to {@dice 1d8} plus your Intelligence modifier (minimum of 1).

table.name: Artillerist Spells
rows: {@spell Cone of Cold|XPHB}, {@spell Wall of Force|XPHB}
